title: Santa's (Zany, Wacky, Just Not Right!) Night Before Christmas
description: It's a holiday story to spark the imagination, make kids giggle, and bring a smile even to a grownup's face. "One Christmas Eve it was a cold stormy night; and nothing at the north pole was going quite right..." Santa’s (Zany, Wacky, Just Not Right!) Night Before Christmas is a beautifully illustrated children’s picture book telling a whimsical tale of Santa's journey through a Christmas Eve that doesn't go as he expects. One small event leads to a series of surprises that change Santa and Christmas as we know it.
author: DK Simoneau
